    • Uses of IRepositoryConnector in org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.connectors

      Classes in org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.connectors that implement IRepositoryConnector 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseRepositoryConnector
      This base class describes an instance of a connection between a repository and ManifoldCF's standard "pull" ingestion agent.
